2:
--------------------
Text: Leap-The-Dips:  Leap-the-Dips operated continuously until 1985, when it closed after falling into disrepair.
Triplets:<Leap-The-Dips
3:
--------------------
<Text: Leap-The-Dips:  A fund-raising campaign led to its restoration, with refurbishment efforts beginning in 1997 and ending with a grand-reopening in 1999.>
Triplets:<Leap-The-Dips
4:
--------------------
<Text: Leap-The-Dips:  It was designated a National Historic Landmark in 1996 and received the Coaster Classic and Coaster Landmark awards from American Coaster Enthusiasts.>
Triplets:<Leap-The-Dips
